name: ciscoSpark
description: Posts a message to a Cisco Spark space.
author: Carlo Wahlstedt

inputs.name: access_token
inputs.label: Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The token from your spark app. https://developer.ciscospark.com/apps.html

inputs.name: teamName
inputs.label: Team Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the team that the Cisco Spark space is a part of. You must add the bot to the team.

inputs.name: roomName
inputs.label: Space Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the space/team that you want to post the message to. You must add the bot to the room.
